name: box()
description: A box is an extruded rectangle. A box with equal dimension on all sides is a cube.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: dimension of the box in all dimensions (creates a cube)

parameters.name: w
parameters.description: dimension of the box in the x-dimension

parameters.name: h
parameters.description: dimension of the box in the y-dimension

parameters.name: d
parameters.description: dimension of the box in the z-dimension
